plot: Maya, a young tormented artist, questions her sense of reality. Is Mark, a dying old man, real or is her mind playing tricks in a way she still has to understand?
title: Lucide
plot_es: Maya, a young tormented artist, questions her sense of reality. Is Mark, a dying old man, real or is her mind playing tricks in a way she still has to understand?
plot_en: Maya, a young tormented artist, questions her sense of reality. Is Mark, a dying old man, real or is her mind playing tricks in a way she still has to understand?
